content: on needles weave in ends row b2 sl1 k to end | | repeat b2 11 15 more times row b3 sl1 k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 repeat b3 11 15 more times there should be 6 8 sts remaining on needles for fishy cloth only | | bind off weave in ends for fishy mitt only | | row c1 sl1 k to end row c2 sl1 k to last 2 sts kfb k2 repeat c2 11 15 more times there should be 18 24 sts on needles row c3 sl1 k to end repeat c3 11 15 more times | | bind off loosely leaving a yarn tail 2-3 times the length of the body of the fish fold fish in half at the mouth the top part should cover most of the body leaving a sleeve for the hand | | using the tail left from binding off sew down one side of the fish weave across the mouth of the fish being careful not to pull too tightly and sew up the second side of the fish | |indicates video help available on youtube com/fishystitcher go to playlist pattern help fishy cloth
